headline: lululemon Dips Below 50-Day SMA: Buy Now or Stay on the Sidelines?
summary: LULU slips below key technical levels as weak U.S. sales, tariff pressures and soft guidance weigh on investor sentiment.

headline: Brooks Running laces up for price hikes in 2026
summary: CEO Dan Sheridan says the hikes will be "slight," with costs rising as much as 3% in 2026

headline: BTIG’s Bullish Stance on Nike (NKE) Supported by Progress on Turnaround and Innovation Drive
summary: Nike Inc. (NYSE:NKE) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Citadel LLC. On October 15, BTIG’s Consumer Retail analyst Robert Drbul initiated coverage of the company, assigning a Buy rating and a $100 price target. The analyst also named Nike as “Top Pick for 2026”, which indicates his strong confidence in the stock. […]

headline: Next Level Apparel Names Brett Bjorkman as CEO, Ushering in the Next Chapter of Premium Blank Apparel
summary: Next Level Apparel––a family-founded leader in supplying premium, ethically sourced blank apparel––today announced Brett Bjorkman as its new Chief Executive Officer, following the retirement of the founder and former CEO, Joe Simsoly.
